sentences.sentence: Leonard Schlesinger, a Harvard academic and former chief executive of Au Bong Pain, a rapidly growing chain of bakery cafes, says that much "re-engineering" has been crude.
sentences.translation: 纳德·施莱辛格是哈佛大学学者及发展迅速的烘焙咖啡连锁店 Au Bong Pain 的前首席执行官，他表示，很多“再设计”都很粗糙。

sentences.sentence: Early in October of my first term at Carnegie Mellon University, I was taught the rudiments of bong-handling by a team of experts.
sentences.translation: 十月初当我在卡内基·梅隆大学上的第一学期，在一帮专家的指导下，我初步学习了使用水烟枪。

sentences.sentence: Researchers are closer to understanding how a bong packed with leaves of Salvia divinorum gave Smiley Miley the giggles.
sentences.translation: 研究人员正在进一步研究塞满鼠尾草叶子的烟斗使麦莉·赛勒斯傻笑的原因。
